name: Marcello over dad - friday night funkin FPS+
name_original: Marcello over dad - friday night funkin FPS+
description:
So basically I got inspired by some people making their marcello thing So I wanted to do the same but with just replacing daddy dearing with marcello so yeah

this is just no offence to marcello I just made it for fun so marcello if you hate it.. that's fine it's your opinion

Luis - dadbattle replacement for the mod

Lordryan1999 - inspired me to do this

Razebud - made FPS plus

also if this gets a like from you guys I might make a Marcello over pico mod but anyway Bye I guess lol

Warning - the sprites for marcello will shake a bit It will be a update where I fix that but for now you just have to play this version for now
